column4: well I made save for gaim, and restarted with added persistent and it didnt work
how can I save settings on USB with 7.0.4?
I did follow the tutorials but I cant seem to get it working correct
i just have to add persistent after the parameters, right?
is there a channel for new users?
Feel free to ask whatever questions you have
what do you mean "tried" ?   you can't boot the Ubuntu LiveCD?
i can but cant use persistent to save settings to usb stick
Yeah, booting from USB can be difficult.  And likely impossible unless you're an advanced user.
You should either just install it if you can, or not bother trying to work off the live cd
hmm I try restarting and entering usb instead of persistent
n/p   sorry I couldn't be of more help
maybe documentation is out of date or it just wont work for me lol
